channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Sea Turtle Entangled in Discarded Fishing Line Rescued
item.description: A green sea turtle in southern Taiwan has been rescued after becoming entangled in a discarded fishing line.

item.title: Taiwanese Inventors Clean Up at World Genius Convention in Japan
item.description: Taiwan accounted for nearly half of the submissions and the majority of winners at this year's World Genius Convention and Education Expo in Tokyo, an annual showcase of amateur in

item.title: Did Tsai Ing-wen Do Enough for Taiwan's Defense?
item.description: Over the past eight years, Taiwan’s outgoing President Tsai Ing-wen has made huge strides toward modernizing the country’s defense, but did she do enough?

item.title: Taiwan's Opposition Party Slam President Tsai's Record as Leader
item.description: Taiwan's main opposition party, the Kuomintang, says President Tsai Ing-wen failed to address rising house prices, stagnant wages and increased hostility with China during her time
